scripts.build: npm run move_public && next build && next export
scripts.rename: node -e "require('fs').rename('_data/test.txt', '_data/test1.txt', function(err) { if (err) console.log(err); console.log('File successfully renamed!') })"
scripts.move_public: mv ./_data/assets public && mv ./_data/_public/favicon.ico public && mv ./_data/_public/manifest.json public && mv ./_data/_public/robots.txt public
scripts.move: move ./_data/assets public && move ./_data/_public/favicon.ico public && move ./_data/_public/manifest.json public && move ./_data/_public/robots.txt public
